6e120025-bca2-4ab5-8f6a-bb390ec35d0d.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

a4fdaeec-4aec-45b3-89c7-3f40815a08ee.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture
